title: Pizza is a Gift
description: Judge John Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse Thorn are in chambers this week so they can clear the docket! They talk about door knocking vs handle jiggling, food storage, family dinner time, eating on public transit, sock folding, and ideal sleeping arrangements!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
